entity.securitycraft:imsbomb.name: I.M.S. Bomb
entity.securitycraft:sentry.name: 戰鬥哨石
entity.securitycraft:bullet.name: 子彈
death.attack.securitycraft.laser.player: %1$s在與%2$s戰鬥時被雷射切割致死
death.attack.securitycraft.fakeWater.pla: %1$s在與%2$s戰鬥時掉入有毒的水中...？
help.securitycraft:laserBlock.info: 雷射槍要放置在每個雷射槍五格的範圍以內。當它們正確的擺放後，它們之間會形成一束雷射。當任意一個玩家透過雷射時，每個雷射槍方塊會輸出 15 格的紅石訊號。
help.securitycraft:keypad.info: 放置好鍵盤右擊即可設定密碼。設定好密碼後再次右鍵，需要輸入密碼。密碼輸入正確後鍵盤將會發出一個為時三秒的紅石訊號。
help.securitycraft:mine.info: 除苦力怕，貓和山貓以外的所有實體接觸地雷會使其爆炸。手持剪線鉗右鍵地雷時能夠將其拆除。使用打火石右鍵直接引爆。
help.securitycraft:dirtMine.info: 泥土地雷是一種標準的地雷。踏上或挖掘都會導致爆炸。
help.securitycraft:furnaceMine.info: 熔爐地雷就像標準的地雷一樣，除了它只會在你右鍵它時爆炸。
help.securitycraft:retinalScanner.info: 當所有者站在它前面時，虹膜掃描儀將會發出一個 15 格的紅石訊號。
help.securitycraft:keycardReader.info: 身份卡讀取器在你設定好等級情況下，將適宜等級的身份卡放入其中，能夠發出 15 格的紅石訊號。
help.securitycraft:reinforcedIronTrapdoo: 強化鐵地板門就像原版地板門一樣，只是它只能使用鍵盤，物品欄掃描器等打開，並且只能由它的放置者破壞。
help.securitycraft:bouncingBetty.info: 彈跳貝蒂在玩家觸碰時彈射起來，並產生劇烈的爆炸。
help.securitycraft:inventoryScanner.info: 物品欄掃描儀需要將兩個掃描儀分開一格且面對面放置。當正確的放置後將會在它們之間產生雷射場。一旦玩家透過這個場，任何在掃描儀的 GUI 中選定的物品將會被刪除。
help.securitycraft:trackMine.info: 當一輛礦車透過其頂部時，鐵軌地雷將會爆炸。
help.securitycraft:cageTrap.info: 當任何玩家從它上面走過，陷阱籠子將會生成一個「籠子」。
help.securitycraft:portableRadar.info: 只要有玩家在雷達的探測範圍之內（可以在設定檔案中修改）攜帶式雷達將會給它的所有者發送一條聊天訊息。你可以使用命名過的命名牌將攜帶式雷達命名。
help.securitycraft:keypadChest.info: 密碼箱裝備有密碼鎖系統，只有在密碼輸入正確時，儲物箱才能打開。
help.securitycraft:usernameLogger.info: 使用者名記錄器在紅石訊號啟動下，能夠記錄三格內任意玩家的名字。
help.securitycraft:reinforced.info: 被強化方塊是牢不可破的方塊。只有放下它們的人才能使用通用的去除器摧毀它們。
help.securitycraft:alarm.info: 報警器能夠在給予紅石訊號時發出警報聲，警報聲間隔為 2 秒（可在設定檔案中調節）。
help.securitycraft:reinforcedFenceGate.i: 強化鐵柵欄門就行原版的柵欄門一樣，但是無法破壞，且只能被鍵盤，物品欄掃描器等開啟。當互動時能夠傷害除擁有者外的其他人。
help.securitycraft:panicButton.info: 緊急按鈕很像普通按鈕，但是卻和控制桿一樣工作。
help.securitycraft:keypadFrame.info: 框架用於合成鍵盤（方塊）以及顯示攝影機畫面。使用鍵盤（物品）右擊能夠得到鍵盤（方塊）。當安裝了LookingGlass模組後，使用綁定過攝影機的監視器右擊能夠顯示攝影機視角。視角會在無分鐘後自動關閉，從而節省資源（但是右擊又可以打開）。
help.securitycraft:claymore.info: 闊劍地雷在前方五格內有實體時，延時一秒爆炸。使用剪線鉗右擊能夠停用掉地雷，而後才可以進行破壞。使用打火石右擊又可以啟用它。
help.securitycraft:keypadFurnace.info: 密碼爐需要需要你設定密碼，設定好後每次右擊打開都需要輸入密碼才能存取。
help.securitycraft:securityCamera.info: 安防攝影機能夠查看其周圍的情況。放置在方塊側面，使用攝影機監視器右擊即可。
help.securitycraft:reinforcedStairsStone: 強化石頭階梯和原版階梯非常類似，但是只有放置它的玩家，在使用通用方塊移除器情況下才能破壞。
help.securitycraft:reinforcedStainedGlas: 強化染色玻璃和原版染色玻璃非常類似，但是只有放置它的玩家，在使用通用方塊移除器情況下才能破壞。
強化染色玻璃片和原版染色玻璃片非常類似，但是只有放置它的玩家，在使用通用方塊移除器情況下才能破壞。
帶電的鐵柵欄和原版柵欄類似，但是無法破壞，並且會傷害接觸它的玩家（除所有者外）。
help.securitycraft:ims.info: I.M.S，也就是智慧彈藥系統，是一個四次使用的地雷。一旦有玩家或者生物踏進開火範圍，就會發射一枚地雷，追蹤生物並且發生爆炸。四枚地雷全部使用完畢後智慧彈藥系統會自毀。
help.securitycraft:reinforcedStairsCobbl: 強化鵝卵石階梯和原版階梯非常類似，但是只有放置它的玩家，在使用通用方塊移除器情況下才能破壞。
help.securitycraft:reinforcedStairsSands: 強化砂石階梯和原版階梯非常類似，但是只有放置它的玩家，在使用通用方塊移除器情況下才能破壞。
help.securitycraft:reinforcedWoodSlabs.i: 強化木半磚和原版木半磚非常類似，但是只有放置它的玩家，在使用通用方塊移除器情況下才能破壞。
強化石半磚和原版石半磚非常類似，但是只有放置它的玩家，在使用通用方塊移除器情況下才能破壞。
help.securitycraft:protecto.info: 抗火牆，來自於卡普空遊戲《洛克人：戰鬥網路2》中的敵人，會利用間隔10秒的閃電攻擊10格範圍內任意生物。當然需要露天，且處於下雨情況下才能觸發。
help.securitycraft:reinforcedStairsStone: 強化石磚階梯和原版階梯非常類似，但是只有放置它的玩家，在使用通用方塊移除器情況下才能破壞。
help.securitycraft:reinforcedStairsBrick: 強化紅磚階梯和原版階梯非常類似，但是只有放置它的玩家，在使用通用方塊移除器情況下才能破壞。
help.securitycraft:reinforcedStairsNethe: 強化地獄磚階梯和原版階梯非常類似，但是只有放置它的玩家，在使用通用方塊移除器情況下才能破壞。
help.securitycraft:reinforcedStairsQuart: 強化石英階梯和原版階梯非常類似，但是只有放置它的玩家，在使用通用方塊移除器情況下才能破壞。
help.securitycraft:reinforcedStairsRedSa: 強化紅砂岩階梯和原版階梯非常類似，但是只有放置它的玩家，在使用通用方塊移除器情況下才能破壞。
help.securitycraft:reinforcedStairsPurpu: 強化紫珀階梯和原版階梯非常類似，但是只有放置它的玩家，在使用通用方塊移除器情況下才能破壞。
觸髮式光源有點像紅石燈，也能夠發出光亮，但是需要設定範圍內有玩家才會觸發。
help.securitycraft:reinforcedStainedHard: 強化染色陶土和原版染色陶土非常類似，但是只有放置它的玩家，在使用通用方塊移除器情況下才能破壞。
help.securitycraft:trophy_system.info: The trophy system, inspired by the gadget first seen in "Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3" published by Activision, targets enemy arrows and fireballs and will destroy them from range after a half-second charge time.
help.securitycraft:crystalQuartz.info: Crystal Quartz blocks are building blocks that can be reinforced in the usual way and are crafted analogously to vanilla quartz blocks.
help.securitycraft:reinforcedCrystalQuar: Reinforced Crystal Quartz Blocks are used to build the Block Pocket. More info on the Block Pocket Manager's page.
help.securitycraft:blockPocketWall.info: Block Pocket Walls are used to build the Block Pocket. More info on the Block Pocket Manager's page.
help.securitycraft:blockPocketManager.in: The Block Pocket Manager is used to manage the Block Pocket, which is a room that only its owner and players on the allowlist can enter. When opening its GUI, you see a selection of sizes. Choose one, then build the Block Pocket around the manager. Make sure that the manager is placed on the outside of the bottom layer. The Block Pocket is a cube of the size you chose. The corners are built with Reinforced Chiseled Crystal Quartz, the blocks between the corners are built with correctly oriented Reinforced Crystal Quartz Pillars, and the floor/wall/ceiling is built with Block Pocket Walls. See this image for an example of how it looks (the Block Pocket Manager is marked with a red arrow) https://i.imgur.com/KLQzMeY.png - Clicking "Activate" after the structure is built will activate any added modules. See the customization GUI for more information (rightclick with Universal Block Modifier).
help.securitycraft:reinforced_stone_pres: The Reinforced Pressure Plates can only be activated by their owner or players on the allowlist.
help.securitycraft:reinforced_stone_butt: The Reinforced Buttons can only be activated by their owner or players on the allowlist.
help.securitycraft:reinforced_lever.info: The Reinforced Lever can only be activated by its owner or players on the allowlist.
help.securitycraft:reinforced_hopper.inf: The Reinforced Hopper is the only block that can be used to extract items out of a password protected chest/furnace if both are owned by the same player. It will otherwise act like a vanilla hopper.
help.securitycraft:projector.info: The Projector projects holographic versions of a block of your choice into the world, which can be used to hide buildings and other areas of interest from other players. The range and width of the projection can be changed within the Projector's GUI.
help.securitycraft:codebreaker.info: 編碼破壞器能夠暴力破解任何鍵盤，密碼箱，密碼爐。只需要手持右擊即可（五次使用限制，2/3機率破壞）。
help.securitycraft:doorIndestructibleIro: 強化鐵門和原版鐵門非常類似，只是它無法破壞。能透過鍵盤，物品欄掃描器等開啟。只有放置它的玩家，在使用通用方塊移除器情況下才能破壞。
help.securitycraft:scannerDoorItem.info: 安全門和虹膜掃描儀很類似，只有在盯著門上半部分才能夠打開，打開後需要手動關門。
help.securitycraft:universalBlockRemover: 通用方塊移除器用於右擊移除「強化」過的方塊。當然，前提是該方塊是由移除者放置的。
help.securitycraft:keycardLV1.info: 身份卡用於身份卡讀取器，總共有六種類型，等級一至五，還有一個有限次數的身份卡，擁有五級等級，但是在生存模式下只能使用五次。
help.securitycraft:keycardLV2.info: 身份卡用於身份卡讀取器，總共有六種類型，等級一至五，還有一個有限次數的身份卡，擁有五級等級，但是在生存模式下只能使用五次。
help.securitycraft:keycardLV3.info: 身份卡用於身份卡讀取器，總共有六種類型，等級一至五，還有一個有限次數的身份卡，擁有五級等級，但是在生存模式下只能使用五次。
help.securitycraft:keycardLV4.info: 身份卡用於身份卡讀取器，總共有六種類型，等級一至五，還有一個有限次數的身份卡，擁有五級等級，但是在生存模式下只能使用五次。
help.securitycraft:keycardLV5.info: 身份卡用於身份卡讀取器，總共有六種類型，等級一至五，還有一個有限次數的身份卡，擁有五級等級，但是在生存模式下只能使用五次。
help.securitycraft:limitedUseKeycard.inf: 身份卡用於身份卡讀取器，總共有六種類型，等級一至五，還有一個有限次數的身份卡，擁有五級等級，但是在生存模式下只能使用五次。
help.securitycraft:remoteAccessMine.info: 遠程地雷存取工具允許你遠程操控地雷。右擊地雷進行綁定，手持右擊對著空氣右擊可以打開GUI，從而進行啟動，取消啟動，或者直接引爆綁定的地雷。
help.securitycraft:remoteAccessSentry.in: The sentry remote access tool will allow you to access sentries remotely. Rightclick on a sentry to 'bind' it to the tool. Rightclick in the air (with the tool equipped) to open the tool's GUI, which will allow you to change the mode of each bound sentry, or of all bound sentries at the same time.
help.securitycraft:bucketFWater.info: 假水桶和普通水桶類似，但是放出的水在接觸時會受傷。
help.securitycraft:bucketFLava.info: 假熔岩桶和熔岩桶類似，但是放出的熔岩在接觸時不會傷害玩家，反而會治癒玩家。
help.securitycraft:universalBlockModifie: 通用方塊修改器能夠自訂SecurityCraft模組加入的方塊。右擊方塊打開GUI，插入模組來加入更多功能。
help.securitycraft:redstoneModule.info: 紅石模組能夠為方塊加入能量屬性。
help.securitycraft:whitelistModule.info: 白名單模組通常用於將特定玩家移除方塊效果或者密碼保護。
help.securitycraft:blacklistModule.info: 黑名單模組通常將玩家加入進方塊效果中，或者阻止他們使用方塊的某些功能。
help.securitycraft:harmingModule.info: 傷害模組能夠給方塊加入傷害屬性。
help.securitycraft:smartModule.info: 智慧模組用於對方塊範圍或者功能進行提升。
help.securitycraft:storageModule.info: 儲存模組加入，或者升級方塊的內部儲存空間。
help.securitycraft:disguiseModule.info: 偽裝模組能夠加入某些方塊，從而進行偽裝。
help.securitycraft:wireCutters.info: 使用剪線鉗右擊地雷能夠使其失活。
help.securitycraft:keypadItem.info: 鍵盤（物品）用於合成鍵盤（方塊），密碼箱，密碼爐。
help.securitycraft:adminTool.info: 管理員工具主要用於顯示SecurityCraft方塊的訊息，諸如方塊的所有者，及其UUID，還有其他訊息，比如密碼或者插入的模組均可顯示。
help.securitycraft:taser.info: 泰瑟槍是一種自充能的眩暈槍，右擊即可開火。任何實體在被擊中後會獲得十秒的噁心II、緩慢II、虛弱II效果。如果泰瑟槍shift右擊（需要物品欄中有紅石）能夠發出兩倍的效果。
help.securitycraft:cameraMonitor.info: 攝影機監視器是一個手持式畫面，用於實時觀看攝影機意見回饋畫面。右擊安防攝影機即可在監視器中進行查看，一段時間後自動關閉來節省資源占用，只需要右擊又可以重新開啟（可設定）
help.securitycraft:scManual.info: SecurityCraft指南用於顯示SecurityCraft模組所加入的所有方塊和物品。
help.securitycraft:universalOwnerChanger: 通用方塊所有者修改器能夠改變方塊的所有者。只需要將修改器放進鐵砧中命名成新擁有者遊戲名。然後只需要右擊方塊即可改變所有者。如果啟用，則可以透過使用未命名的修改器右擊來認領沒有所有者的方塊。
help.securitycraft:universalBlockReinfor: 通用方塊強化器能夠強化一些原版方塊，將其變成SecurityCraft對應的強化方塊，LvL1擁有300次使用次數，非創造模式下左擊任何方塊即為強化。
通用方塊強化器能夠強化一些原版方塊，將其變成SecurityCraft對應的強化方塊，LvL2擁有2700次使用次數，非創造模式下左擊任何方塊即為強化。
通用方塊強化器能夠強化一些原版方塊，將其變成SecurityCraft對應的強化方塊，LvL3擁有無限次使用次數，非創造模式下左擊任何方塊即為強化。
help.securitycraft:briefcase.info: 公文包擁有一個簡單的密碼鎖，同時能夠儲存20格物品。合成後右擊打開設定初始四位數字密碼。再次右擊輸入密碼即可打開內部介面。
help.securitycraft:universalKeyChanger.i: 通用密鎖變換器允許你修改你名下擁有密碼保護的方塊。右擊密碼保護的方塊打開GUI，然後再次輸入新的密碼。與公文包合成能夠移除它的密碼。
help.securitycraft:secretSignItem.info: 安全告示板很像原版告示板，不過只有它的所有者能夠查看其上的文字。放置後確保沒有人能夠破壞它。
help.securitycraft:sentry.info: 哨兵有三種模式，可以透過右擊來切換。空閒（它永遠不會攻擊）、偽裝（它只攻擊範圍內的敵方玩家）和攻擊性（它會攻擊敵方生物和敵方玩家）。用包含一個完整不透明方塊（例如石頭，但不是玻璃或階梯）的偽裝模組右擊它會使哨兵偽裝自己。模組可以直接切換，也可以透過右擊通用塊修改器來提取。要移除哨兵，請用游標右擊它。
help.securitycraft:crystalQuartzItem.inf: Crystal Quartz is used to craft Crystal Quartz blocks.
help.securitycraft:keypad_door_item.info: The Keypad Door acts like a Keypad combined with a Reinforced Iron Door, where a code has to be inserted in order to open the door.
help.securitycraft:speed_module.info: The speed module allows some of SecurityCraft's blocks to operate faster than usual.
gui.securitycraft:scManual.ownableBlock: 可擁有：此方塊具有抗爆炸性，只能由將其放下的玩家使用'通用方塊去除器'打破。
gui.securitycraft:scManual.passwordProte: 受密碼保護：只有正確輸入所有者設置的密碼，才能使用此方塊。
gui.securitycraft:scManual.viewActivated: 已啟動檢視：此方塊可以看著她來激活。
gui.securitycraft:scManual.explosiveBloc: 爆炸性：此方塊能夠遠端引爆，並且可以使用地雷遠端訪問工具啟動/停用。
gui.securitycraft:scManual.customizableB: 可自訂：您可以使用通用方塊修改器和安全工藝添加的各種模組來自定義此方塊的功能。
gui.securitycraft:scManual.recipe.reinfo: 由通用方塊強化器中的一般水晶石英塊製成。
gui.securitycraft:scManual.recipe.keypad: 放下一個密碼鎖框架，用密碼鎖右鍵點擊它。
放下一個箱子，用密碼鎖右擊它。
放下一個熔爐，用鑰匙卡右擊它。
gui.securitycraft:scManual.recipe.reinfo: 拿通用方塊強化器右擊打開GUI，丟入原版方塊，退出GUI後即強化成功。
任意強化方塊均可透過如下方式合成：放置一個對應的普通的原版方塊（比如強化石頭->石頭），然後使用通用方塊強化器左擊它，亦或是在使用通用方塊破壞器右擊時，在GUI格子中放置對應方塊即可。
gui.securitycraft:scManual.recipe.admin_: 管理員工具僅通過創意背包提供，前提是它通過配置檔啟用。
gui.securitycraft:scManual.recipe.sc_man: 安全工藝手冊僅通過創意背包或鍵入'/sc help'
gui.securitycraft:scManual.patreon.title: Our Patrons:
gui.securitycraft:invScan.emit_redstone: 在找到以上物品時發射紅石訊號：%s
gui.securitycraft:protectedFurnace.name: 受保護的熔爐
gui.securitycraft:mrat.name: 地雷的遠程存取工具
gui.securitycraft:srat.name: 哨兵遠端訪問工具
gui.securitycraft:monitor.cameraInDiffer: 你無法查看這個攝影機，因為此攝影機在其他維度，其維度 ID 為 #。
gui.securitycraft:blockReinforcer.title: 通用方塊強化器
gui.securitycraft:blockPocketManager.nee: 需要一個儲存模組來實現防禦空間的自動組裝。
gui.securitycraft:trophy_system.moduleRe: You need to install a Smart Module to toggle which projectile types can be targeted by this Trophy System.
gui.securitycraft:trophy_system.toggle: Click the entries in the list below to toggle the targeting of that specific projectile type.
gui.securitycraft:keycard_reader.noSmart: You need a Smart Module to control the keycard levels individually.
gui.securitycraft:keycard_reader.level_m: The level of this keycard is not enabled in this keycard reader!
messages.securitycraft:bugReport: 請在我們的不和諧伺服器上的#bugreport頻道中報告錯誤。請先閱讀規則
messages.securitycraft:retinalScanner.no: 很抱歉，您不能使用此掃描器。它由%s擁有。
messages.securitycraft:portableRadar.wit: %1$s位於您的便攜式雷達附近，名為%2$s。
%1$s靠近您的便攜式雷達，為2美元。
messages.securitycraft:codebreakerDisabl: 密碼斷路器已通過配置檔被停用。
messages.securitycraft:codebreaker.faile: Code breaking attempt failed, please try again.
messages.securitycraft:keycardReader.dif: The Keycard Reader that this card was linked to belongs to a different player than the one you are trying to use!
messages.securitycraft:keycardReader.wro: The signature saved on this card does not match the Keycard Reader's signature!
This Keycard Reader does not allow keycards of level %s!
messages.securitycraft:keycardReader.noU: This Keycard does not have any uses left!
messages.securitycraft:invScan.notConnec: 這未連接到另一個安全檢測器塊！
messages.securitycraft:module.onAllowlis: You are added to the allowlist.
messages.securitycraft:module.onDenylist: You are added to the denylist.
messages.securitycraft:module.notHolding: 您必須持有要儲存資料的模組。
messages.securitycraft:module.alreadyCon: 您持有的模組已經包含播放機#。
messages.securitycraft:module.added: 將#添加到已舉行的模組。
messages.securitycraft:module.notHolding: 您必須持有要修改的模組！
messages.securitycraft:notOwned: 對不起，你不能這樣做。它由%s擁有。
messages.securitycraft:adminTool.noInfo: 此方塊沒有要顯示的資訊！
messages.securitycraft:adminTool.needCre: 您需要處於創造模式才能使用管理工具。
messages.securitycraft:adminTool.disable: The Admin Tool has been disabled through the config file.
messages.securitycraft:reinforcedSlab.ca: 你必須是這個方塊的主人，把它變成一個雙板。
messages.securitycraft:cameraMonitor.can: 無法查看不屬於自己的監視器控制台。
messages.securitycraft:cameraMonitor.unb: 已取消綁定位於%s的監視器。
messages.securitycraft:mrat.noSlots: 有沒有更多的空插槽綁定這個地雷！
messages.securitycraft:mrat.cantBind: 你不能綁定一個不屬於你的礦。
messages.securitycraft:mrat.bound: 遠程存取工具已經綁定位於 %s 地雷
messages.securitycraft:srat.noSlots: 沒有更多的空插槽綁定這個哨兵！
messages.securitycraft:srat.cantBind: 你不能約束一個不屬於你的哨兵。
messages.securitycraft:srat.bound: 已將%s的哨兵連結到遠端訪問工具。
messages.securitycraft:universalOwnerCha: 您需要使用鐵砧重新命名成新擁有者的名稱。
此方塊無法容納擁有者。請正確點擊適當的安全工藝方塊。
這不是你的方塊，你不能改變它的主人。
非擁有者，您無法申請方塊。
這不是你的公事包，你不能改變它的主人。
messages.securitycraft:irc.connected: 截至安全世界的v1.8.3，IRC聊天不再支援。如果您需要説明，請參閱安全工藝的「不和諧」上的#help頻道！
messages.securitycraft:frame.rightclick: 右擊一個綁定的監視器進行查看。
messages.securitycraft:command.sc.usage: 使用：/sc連接或/sc斷開連接或/sc聯繫或/sc簡歷
messages.securitycraft:tip.scHelp: 鍵入/sc説明將為您提供安全工藝手冊的配方，該手冊將顯示安全克拉夫特塊/專案的幫助資訊。
messages.securitycraft:tip.patreon: 如果你喜歡安全工藝，請考慮支持我們在派特雷恩！您可以與我們合作，在mod中獲取您選擇的功能。
messages.securitycraft:tip.discord: 有一個建議的模組或發現一個錯誤？加入我們的不和諧伺服器（僅限英語）！您還將收到有關安全程式的重要更新和公告。
messages.securitycraft:tip.outdated: 您的安全世界版本已過時！考慮更新以提供更多的功能和更少的錯誤。
messages.securitycraft:tip.scserver: 官方安全工藝伺服器回來了！使用此IP加入：securitycraft.nodecraft.gg
messages.securitycraft:universalKeyChang: 右鍵與通用鑰匙更換器一起點擊密碼鎖方塊以更改其密碼。
此公事包的密碼已重置。
這個公事包沒有密碼，不能重置。
這不是你的公事包，你不能改變它的密碼。
messages.securitycraft:passwordProtected: 此方塊尚未有密碼。您無法與它互動。
messages.securitycraft:sentry.needsBlock: 你必須把哨兵放在一個方塊的上面！
確保你的哨兵四面都有障礙物！
messages.securitycraft:sentry.mode1: 目前模式：攻擊（總是活躍，攻擊敵對的生物和玩家）
messages.securitycraft:sentry.mode2: 目前模式：偽裝（當玩家靠近時啟動，攻擊玩家）
messages.securitycraft:sentry.descriptio: （始終活躍，攻擊敵對的暴徒和玩家）
（當敵對的暴徒或玩家靠近時啟動，攻擊敵對的暴徒和玩家）
（當敵對暴徒靠近時啟動，攻擊敵對暴徒）
（當玩家靠近時啟動，攻擊玩家）
messages.securitycraft:blockpocket.multi: 結構中有多個防禦空間管理器。
messages.securitycraft:blockpocket.alrea: 防禦空間已經組裝好了！
messages.securitycraft:blockpocket.inval: 支柱%1$s防禦空間管理器旋轉不正確！
無效區塊"%2$s"%1$s防禦空間管理器！（預期:"%3$s"）
messages.securitycraft:blockpocket.block: "%2$s"正在阻止空間%1$s防禦空間管理器！
messages.securitycraft:blockpocket.unown: 您不擁有方塊"%2$s"%1$s防禦空間管理器！
messages.securitycraft:blockpocket.notEn: 你沒有足夠的項目來組裝這種大小的防禦空間！
messages.securitycraft:blockpocket.assem: Assembling the Block Pocket has failed %1$s the Block Pocket Manager. (Incorrect Block: %2$s)
你可以加入 # 個方塊和 $ 個物品。
tooltip.securitycraft:projector: Projects fake blocks into the world.
tooltip.securitycraft:keycard.reader_own: Works on Keycard Readers owned by: %s
tooltip.securitycraft:keycard.link_info: Put this card into a Keycard Reader to link it.
tooltip.securitycraft:keycard.limited_in: Combine this card with a Limited Use Keycard in a crafting table to control how often it can be used.
module.securitycraft:ims.whitelistModule: 給智慧彈藥系統加入白名單模組，白名單玩家能夠在智慧彈藥系統範圍內不被當做目標。
module.securitycraft:ims.speed_module.de: Adding a speed module to an I.M.S. will make the I.M.S. shoot faster, as well as increase the speed of the shot bombs.
module.securitycraft:inventoryScanner.wh: 給物品欄掃描器加入白名單模組，白名單玩家在經過物品掃描器是，不會檢查他們的物品欄。
module.securitycraft:inventoryScanner.sm: 為物品欄掃描器加入智慧模組，能夠讓掃描器檢查帶有附魔或者其他元數據的物品。
module.securitycraft:inventoryScanner.st: 為掃描器加入儲存模組，能夠使掃描器在內部容器中儲存它刪除的物品。
module.securitycraft:inventoryScanner.di: Adding a disguise module to an inventory scanner will cause the texture & model of it to change to the texture & model of the block that is added to the disguise module.
module.securitycraft:inventoryScanner.re: Adding a redstone module to an inventory scanner will cause it to emit a redstone signal whenever a listed item is found when something passes through its field.
module.securitycraft:keycardReader.white: 給身份卡讀取器加入白名單模組，能夠使玩家使用任何身份卡使用讀取器。
module.securitycraft:keycardReader.black: 給身份卡讀取器加入黑名單模組，能夠使玩家使用無法使用讀取器。
module.securitycraft:keycardReader.disgu: Adding a disguise module to a keycard reader will cause the texture & model of it to change to the texture & model of the block that is added to the disguise module.
module.securitycraft:keycardReader.smart: Adding a smart module to a keycard reader will allow for unrestricted control of the keycard levels accepted by the keycard reader.
module.securitycraft:keypad.whitelistMod: 給鍵盤加入白名單模組，能夠使玩家不輸入密碼即可使用方塊。
module.securitycraft:keypad.blacklistMod: 給鍵盤加入白名單模組，能夠使玩家無法使用方塊。
module.securitycraft:keypad.disguiseModu: 給鍵盤加入為偽裝模組，能夠使其材質偽裝為書櫃材質。
module.securitycraft:laserBlock.harmingM: 為雷射器加入傷害模組，能夠使玩家在經過雷射時受到傷害。
module.securitycraft:laserBlock.whitelis: 為雷射器加入白名單模組，能夠使玩家在經過雷射時不發出紅石訊號。
module.securitycraft:laserBlock.disguise: Adding a disguise module to a laser block will cause the texture & model of it to change to the texture & model of the block that is added to the disguise module.
module.securitycraft:portableRadar.redst: 為攜帶式雷達加入紅石模組，能夠使玩家在攜帶雷達範圍內發出紅石訊號。
module.securitycraft:portableRadar.white: 為攜帶式雷達加入白名單模組，能夠使白名單玩家在攜帶雷達範圍內不被記錄。
module.securitycraft:retinalScanner.whit: 為虹膜掃描儀加入白名單模組，能夠使非放置玩家使用掃描儀。
module.securitycraft:retinalScanner.disg: Adding a disguise module to a retinal scanner will cause the texture & model of it to change to the texture & model of the block that is added to the disguise module.
module.securitycraft:securityCamera.reds: 為攝影機加入紅石模組，能夠使攝影機在啟用時發出15格的紅石訊號。
module.securitycraft:securityCamera.smar: Adding the smart module to a camera lets anyone access the camera.
module.securitycraft:protecto.whitelistM: 為抗火牆加入白名單模組，能夠使白名單玩家踏入攻擊範圍而不被攻擊。
module.securitycraft:protecto.speed_modu: Adding a speed module to a protecto will allow it to attack twice as fast.
Adding a disguise module to a Block Pocket Manager will make the Block Pocket's sides opaque.
Adding an allowlist module to a Block Pocket Manager will allow listed players to pass through the Block Pocket's sides.

Adding a storage module to a Block Pocket Manager will add an inventory to it, allowing you to store the blocks you need for building the Block Pocket. This also allows you to auto-assemble the Block Pocket if all necessary building materials are present.
module.securitycraft:reinforced_stone_pr: Adding an allowlist module to a Reinforced Stone Pressure Plate will allow listed players to activate it.
module.securitycraft:usernameLogger.disg: Adding a disguise module to a username logger will cause the texture & model of it to change to the texture & model of the block that is added to the disguise module.
module.securitycraft:cageTrap.disguiseMo: Adding a disguise module to a cage trap will cause the texture & model of it to change to the texture & model of the block that is added to the disguise module.
module.securitycraft:cageTrap.whitelistM: Adding an allowlist module to a Cage Trap will prevent listed players from being trapped.
module.securitycraft:reinforced_wooden_p: Adding an allowlist module to a Reinforced Oak Pressure Plate will allow listed players to activate it.
module.securitycraft:reinforced_stone_bu: Adding an allowlist module to a Reinforced Button will allow listed players to activate it.
module.securitycraft:reinforced_wooden_b: Adding an allowlist module to a Reinforced Button will allow listed players to activate it.
module.securitycraft:reinforced_lever.wh: Adding an allowlist module to a Reinforced Lever will allow listed players to activate it.
module.securitycraft:keypadChest.whiteli: Adding an allowlist module to a Password-protected Chest will allow listed players to open it without knowing the code. Additionally, Reinforced Hoppers owned by listed players can extract items from the chest.
module.securitycraft:keypadChest.blackli: Adding a denylist module to a Password-protected Chest will ban listed players from interacting with the block.
module.securitycraft:keypadChest.redston: Adding a redstone module to a Password-protected Chest will make the chest output a redstone signal while being open, with a strength depending on how many players are simultaneously looking into the chest.
module.securitycraft:keypadFurnace.white: Adding an allowlist module to a Password-protected Furnace will allow listed players to open it without knowing the code. Additionally, Reinforced Hoppers owned by listed players can extract items from the furnace.
module.securitycraft:keypadFurnace.black: Adding a denylist module to a Password-protected Furnace will ban players from interacting with the block.
module.securitycraft:projector.redstoneM: Adding a redstone module to a Projector will allow you to manually toggle the Projector on and off using redstone power.
module.securitycraft:projector.disguiseM: Adding a disguise module to a Projector will cause the texture & model of it to change to the texture & model of the block that is added to the disguise module.
module.securitycraft:secret_sign.whiteli: Adding an allowlist module to a Secret Sign will allow listed players to interact with, and view the text on it.
module.securitycraft:scannerDoor.whiteli: Adding an allowlist module to a scanner door will allow listed players to use the scanner door even if they aren't the player who placed down the block.
module.securitycraft:reinforced_hopper.w: Adding an allowlist module to a reinforced hopper will allow listed players to access the hopper's contents and extract out of their own password-protected chests/furnaces/... using this hopper.
module.securitycraft:keypad_door.whiteli: Adding an allowlist module to a keypad door will allow listed players to use the block without knowing the code.
module.securitycraft:keypad_door.blackli: Adding a denylist module to a keypad door will ban listed players from interacting with the block.
module.securitycraft:usernameLogger.whit: Adding an allowlist module to a Username Logger will prevent listed players from being logged.
module.securitycraft:trophy_system.smart: Adding a smart module to a Trophy System will allow you to configure which projectile types the Trophy System is allowed to target.
module.securitycraft:trophy_system.white: Adding an allowlist module to a Trophy System will make it ignore projectiles thrown by listed playerss, as well as their Sentries' bullets and I.M.S.' bombs.
module.securitycraft:trophy_system.speed: Adding a speed module to a Trophy System allows it to destroy targets twice as fast.
module.securitycraft:reinforced_cauldron: Adding an allowlist module to a Reinforced Cauldron will allow listed playerss to interact with the Reinforced Cauldron.
config.securitycraft:allowAdminTool: 是否允許使用管理工具？
config.securitycraft:shouldSpawnFire: 地雷爆炸時會引發火災？
config.securitycraft:shouldSpawnFire.too: 地雷爆炸後應該引發火災嗎？
config.securitycraft:ableToBreakMines.to: 玩家應該能夠打破地雷而不爆炸嗎？
config.securitycraft:ableToCraftLUKeycar: 可製作的有限使用鑰匙卡？
有限的使用鑰匙卡是否可製作？
config.securitycraft:smallerMineExplosio: 如果地雷的爆炸比平常小。
config.securitycraft:mineExplodesWhenInC: 地雷在創意中破碎時爆炸？
如果地雷在創意模式下被破壞，是否應該爆炸？
如果安裝了「LookingGlass」，會在啟動後5分鐘後關閉控制台以節省資源
config.securitycraft:useLookingGlass.too: 如果未安裝「LookingGlass」，安全工藝是否應使用「LookingGlass」來查看監視器？
config.securitycraft:laserBlockRange.too: 從多少個方塊之外，激光塊可以連接到另一個激光塊？
config.securitycraft:sayThanksMessage: 在生成時顯示「提示」訊息？
config.securitycraft:sayThanksMessage.to: 加入世界時，是否應該向玩家發送「提示」訊息？
config.securitycraft:debuggingMode: 除錯模式是否為除錯模式？（不建議！
config.securitycraft:debuggingMode.toolt: 安全工藝應該在調試模式下運行嗎？（將額外內容記錄到主控台，可能會添加可能為越野車的未完成項目/塊。
config.securitycraft:isIrcBotEnabled.too: 內置的互聯網中繼聊天機器人（在使用命令時使用'/sc connect'and'/sc contact'）是否啟用？
config.securitycraft:disconnectOnWorldCl: 斷開IRC機器人在世界退出？
如果您已使用命令'/sc connect'or'/sc contact',如果您離開您所在的世界，IRC機器人是否應該斷開連接？
config.securitycraft:useOldKeypadRecipe: 使用舊密碼鎖方塊配方（9個按鈕）？
應該啟用9個按鈕的過時密碼鎖方塊配方嗎？

help.securitycraft:ironDoorReinforced.in: The reinforced iron door is the same as the vanilla iron door, except it is unbreakable. It can only be opened by Keypads, Inventory Scanners, etc. The owner of the door can use the universal block remover to break it down.
help.securitycraft:scannerDoor.info: The Scanner Door acts like a Retinal Scanner combined with a Reinforced Iron Door, where the owner looks at the top to open it.
help.securitycraft:keypad_door.info: The Keypad Door acts like a Keypad combined with a Reinforced Iron Door, where a code has to be inserted in order to open the door.
help.securitycraft:sonic_security_system: The Sonic Security System, inspired by the similarly-named device in the game "Metroid Prime 2: Echoes", is able to lock certain SecurityCraft blocks and prevent them from being used or interacted with. Right-clicking a supported block while sneaking will bind it to the Sonic Security System. Once it is placed down, right-clicking it will open a GUI where you can enable, disable, or reset the Sonic Security System. The blocks can be unlocked by playing a tune nearby, either via the Portable Tune Player, or note blocks. To set such a tune, toggle note recording on in the Sonic Security System's GUI then play the tune that you want using note blocks played nearby. Toggle the recording off once you are finished. Any time that tune is played nearby the Sonic Security System, blocks locked by it will become accessible for a short while.
help.securitycraft:key_panel.info: The key panel can be placed down for a smaller version of the keypad. It is also used in the crafting recipes of keypads, password-protected chests, and password-protected furnaces.
The portable tune player can play a tune that was previously saved to it. To save a tune, rightclick a Sonic Security System that has already recorded a tune. To play the tune, rightclick the portable tune player. To cancel the playback, simply rightclick the portable tune player again or stop holding it.
gui.securitycraft:scManual.lockable: Lockable: This block can be locked with a Sonic Security System.
messages.securitycraft:cameraMonitor.cam: The camera at position %s is not available. It may either not be loaded, in a different dimension, or it no longer exists.
messages.securitycraft:universalOwnerCha: The block's owner has been changed and thus needs to be validated by the new owner to work again. To validate a block, the new owner of the block has to rightclick it.
messages.securitycraft:ownable.validate: The owner of this block has been successfully validated.
messages.securitycraft:ownable.ownerNotV: This block's owner has been changed by the Universal Owner Changer and thus needs to be validated by the new owner to work again. To validate a block, the new owner of the block has to rightclick it.
messages.securitycraft:sonic_security_sy: Not linked with a block yet. Please sneak-right-click a compatible SecurityCraft block with this item in your hand first.
You cannot link to additional blocks. Each Sonic Security System can be linked to a maximum of %s blocks.
This %s is being locked by a Sonic Security System!
module.securitycraft:securityCamera.whit: Adding the allowlist module to a camera will allow listed players to access the camera.
module.securitycraft:protecto.disguiseMo: Adding a disguise module to a protecto will cause the texture & model of it to change to the texture & model of the block that is added to the disguise module.
module.securitycraft:keypadFurnace.disgu: Adding a disguise module to a Password-protected Furnace will cause the texture & model of it to change to the texture & model of the block that is added to the disguise module.
module.securitycraft:trophy_system.disgu: Adding a disguise module to a Trophy System will cause the texture & model of it to change to the texture & model of the block that is added to the disguise module.
module.securitycraft:key_panel.whitelist: Adding an allowlist module to a key panel  will allow listed players to use the block without knowing the code.
module.securitycraft:key_panel.blacklist: Adding a denylist module to a key panel will ban listed players from interacting with the block.
module.securitycraft:sonic_security_syst: Adding an allowlist module to a sonic security system will allow listed players to save the system's tune onto a portable tune player, as well as listen to the tune in the system's GUI.
Adding a redstone module to a sonic security system lets the system emit a redstone signal when the correct tune was played.
config.securitycraft:enableTeamOwnership: Set this to true to enable every player on a scoreboard team to own the blocks of every other player on the same team. This enables players on the same team to break each other's reinforced blocks, change options, add/remove modules, and have access to all other owner-restricted things.
config.securitycraft:trickScannersWithPl: Set this to true if you want players wearing a different player's skull to be able to trick their retinal scanners and scanner doors into activating.
option.securitycraft:key_panel.isAlwaysA: Should the key panel remain active and unlocked?
option.securitycraft:key_panel.sendMessa: Does this key panel send a message upon activation (when using allowlist/denylist modules)?
option.securitycraft:key_panel.signalLen:
Signal length: #
option.securitycraft:key_panel.signalLength.description=How long should the redstone signal upon successful activation be? (In ticks, 20 ticks = 1 second)
option.securitycraft:sonic_security_syst:
Time active: #
option.securitycraft:sonic_security_system.signalLength.description=How long should the sonic security system unlock blocks/give off a redstone signal after hearing the correct tune? (In ticks, 20 ticks = 1 second)
help.securitycraft.reinforced.info: Reinforced blocks are unbreakable building blocks with vanilla equivalents. Only the person who placed them down can destroy them using the universal block remover.
help.securitycraft.block_mines.info: Block mines are mines disguised as a different block. Walking into, or mining one of them, will cause it to explode. This is not the case for the owner of the block mine.
help.securitycraft.reinforced_buttons.in: The reinforced buttons can only be activated by their owner or players on the allowlist.
help.securitycraft.reinforced_pressure_p: The reinforced pressure plates can only be activated by their owner or players on the allowlist.
help.securitycraft.keycards.info: Keycards can be linked to Keycard Readers in order to open them. To reset the settings on keycard, put it into a crafting table. See the Keycard Reader's manual page for more information.
help.securitycraft.block_reinforcers.inf: The Universal Block Reinforcer reinforces numerous vanilla blocks, and turns them into the SecurityCraft variants. To do this, right-click the Universal Block Reinforcer and put the vanilla block into the top slot, then close the GUI. Alternatively, break any block (while not in creative mode) to reinforce it. To convert a reinforced block back to its vanilla variant, use the bottom slot (only available for the level 2 reinforcer). The level 1 reinforcer has 300 uses, level 2 has 2700 uses, and level 3 has unlimited uses.
tile.securitycraft:laserField.name: Laser Field
help.securitycraft:block_change_detector: The Block Change Detector detects players breaking and/or placing blocks in its vicinity (5 blocks by default, can be changed with the universal block modifier). Right-clicking the block will open its interface, where a list of detected changes can be seen, as well as whether it only detects breaking or placing blocks, or both.
gui.securitycraft:scManual.recipe.bucket: The Fake Lava Bucket is created in the brewing stand, by putting any healing potion into the top slot, and up to three lava buckets in the bottom slots.
The Fake Water Bucket is created in the brewing stand, by putting any harming potion into the top slot, and up to three water buckets in the bottom slots.
Install a Smart Module to allow the detector to only detect a specific block type!
module.securitycraft:block_change_detect: Adding a disguise module to a block change detector will cause the texture & model of it to change to the texture & model of the block that is added to the disguise module.

Adding an allowlist module to a block change detector will allow listed players to place/break blocks in the block's vicinity, without getting logged. They will also be able to view all logged entries, however they cannot clear them, or change the block's settings.
Adding a redstone module to a block change detector makes it emit a redstone signal each time it detectes a block was changed by a player in its vicinity.
Adding a smart module to a block change detector allows it to only log changes of one specific type of block. The block can be set in the GUI.
option.securitycraft:block_change_detect:
Signal length: #
option.securitycraft:block_change_detector.signalLength.description=How long should the redstone signal after detecting a block change be? (In ticks, 20 ticks = 1 second)
How far away should the detector be able to detect block changes by players?
option.generic.disabled.description: Should this block be disabled, making it no longer work until it is enabled again?
